name: Pineapple's Match-3 Thing
description:
A visually-clean match-3 experience. No distracting music, no potentially jarring sound effects, no worrying about the game eventually being over. Just calm, relaxing matching.

Unsurprisingly, made by Pineapple, with encouragement, help, and feedback from Sophira.

Proudly made using the DragonRuby Game Toolkit
